allow: Bash(node -e "const rp = require\(''react-pdf/package.json''\); console.log\(''react-pdf:'', rp.version\); const pd = require\(''pdfjs-dist/package.json''\); console.log\(''pdfjs-dist:'', pd.version\)")
Bash(node -e "const rp = require\(''react-pdf/package.json''\); console.log\(''react-pdf pdfjs-dist dep:'', rp.dependencies?.[''pdfjs-dist''] || rp.peerDependencies?.[''pdfjs-dist'']\)")
